STATE v. STATON No. COA04-1408 North Carolina Court of Appeals Filed August 16, 2005 Certification Date September 6, 2005 Appeal from Buncombe (02CRS4636, 02CRS4637, 02CRS4638, 02CRS4639, 02CRS4640, 02CRS4641, 02CRS4642, 02CRS4643, 02CRS4644, 02CRS4645, 02CRS4646, 02CRS4647, 02CRS4648, 02CRS3482, 02CRS3483, 02CRS59298).
